transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon. Tejas bol raha tha sir.
Customer: Haan ji good afternoon ji Tejas ji.
Executive: Sir abhi aapko connect karne ka hai kya sir?
Customer: Haan connect kar lijiye sir but dekho sir aisa hai ki mere ko aapke khilaf aisa kuch bhi nahi hai, ek percent bhi nahi hai but IndiaMART se jarur narazgi hai. Aapse meri koi narazgi nahi hai.
Executive: IndiaMART se narazgi thi lekin aapne to jo not satisfied kiya na usse to meri rating kharab hui hai na. Ultimately company will ask me na ki tumne kya service diya tha.
Customer: Dekho aapki nahi ki hai, maine IndiaMART ki ki hai.
Executive: Sir the thing is ki actually kya hai na wo ultimately meri hi rating kharab ho rahi hai but koi baat nahi maine apne end se koshish kiya hai hamesha se.
Customer: Dekho kisi na kisi pe to aayega na sir. Main to aapke senior ko blame karunga aapko kyu blame karunga ya to jinhone bhi kaam kiya mere isko unko blame karunga.
Executive: Definitely.
Customer: Sir dekho paisa bada hard earned money hota hai aise free me paisa nahi aata jo hum lagate hain.
Executive: Nahi sir ultimately dekhiye agar aapki baat mai nahi samajhta dekhiye subah bhi conversation itni lambi hui hai aapse aur maine aapki koi bhi baat aisa bhi nahi ki acknowledge na ki ho. Mai bhi aapki baat samajh raha hu lekin dekhiye mai apne end se jo kar sakta hu wahi to hai na ab mere se pehle aapke kya coordination hota tha aapke kitna communication diya gaya. To wo bahut cheeze matter karti hai na sir.
Customer: Sir wo dekho kya coordination hota tha wo IndiaMART jaanta hai. Mai ye nahi jaanta ki aap jaante ho kal ko aapke baad koi aur aake aapke bare me kahegi inhone kya kiya mai nahi jaanta to mai kya jawab du.
Executive: Definitely, sahi baat hai.
Customer: Bhai wo to IndiaMART ki panel pe thi na. To wo IndiaMART jaane na unhone kyu rakha us panel pe agar wo kaam nahi kar sakti thi to.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ya aap kaam nahi kar sakte to aapko kyu rakha gaya?
Executive: Koi baat nahi hai sir dekhiye maine apne end se hamesha koshish ki hai aur aage bhi koshish karunga kyuki jab tak mere paas aapka account rahega tab tak mera hamesha yahi like rahega ki mai aapke end pe jo bhi account pe like registration status ho.
Customer: Sir problem na ho kya raha hai ki isme na spam itna jyada spam aa raha hai itna jyada spam aa raha hai ki mai spam ke liye mai paisa kyu kharcha kar raha hu. Log free me spam nahi attend karna pasand karte ho mujhe paise deke spam thodi na sununga mai.
Executive: Spam bole to matlab kuch calls hai aise spam wali?
Customer: Spam, S P A M, spam calls nahi hoti spam messages spam calls.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To like aapne jhooth bola mai lakhon rupay deke spam ki call sunne ke liye baitha hu kya?
Executive: Aapki sari calls spam me aa rahi hai?
Customer: Bahut sari it's matlab ye samjho ki 20% calls spam calls hai.
Executive: Sir sari calls to PNS ke through aati hogi na aisa.
Customer: PNS se bhi spam aata hai na.
Executive: PNS bhi spam me aata hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Wo aap.
Customer: Samasya to yahi pe aa rahi hai mere ko ki PNS pe koi call karke koi joke puch raha hai koi saman bech raha hai koi matlab bol matlab really mere ko rasta puchne ke liye phone kar raha hai wo PNS pe phone kar rahe hain sare.
Executive: Actually kya hai ye aapke PNS pe hi call aati hai but the thing is ki jo PNS hai na wo aapke true caller me na not like usme spam me markd hoga that's why aapko jo bhi call aa rahi hai na wo spam.
Customer: Wo mai nahi samajh raha but kul milake jo PNS ka IndiaMART ne number diya hai na wo google pe front me wahi show ho raha hai kyu is front me show ho raha hai wo.
Executive: Kyuki sir aapko.
Customer: Aap ek baar search kijiye na wo matlab google pe search kijiye Gemsen India ka number wo aapko IndiaMART ka number show ho raha hai kyu ho raha hai bhai waha pe?
Executive: Aapka jo sir actually kya hai na aapki jo catalog hai. Thik hai. Catalog pe aap wahi to keh rahe hai na ki aapke jo catalog pe number markd ho ke aata hai wahi to keh rahe hai na. Jo bhi aapka success rate jo bhi likha hota hai uske niche wahi wala keh rahe hai kya?
Customer: Aap Gemsen India Private Limited search kijiye online. Thik hai. Search kijiye ek baar.
Executive: Kiya.
Customer: Aap ye bataiye number kaunsa aaya isme?
Executive: IndiaMART wale me na. Isme aapka jo mobile.
Customer: Nahi mai online IndiaMART chhod dijiye ek baar ko IndiaMART ko bhul jaiye aap.
Executive: Thik hai normally matlab aise google pe normal dekhte hai waisa na.
Customer: Normal google pe search kijiye google.com pe Gemsen India Private Limited search kijiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye aapka address aa raha hai sector 38 phase 2 Rajinder Nagar Delhi aa raha hai. Phone number bataiye kya hai?
Executive: 8048971272.
Customer: Ispe call kijiye ek baar.
Executive: Sir call kare ispe call karna hai ek minute rukiyega.
Customer: Wo IndiaMART se call lead banke aa jayegi.
Executive: Achha aisa?
Customer: Haan. Mai kyu attend karunga yaar ye call. Ye to possible hi nahi hai. Ye to possible nahi hai to aap possible hai na mai practical karne ke liye keh raha hu na aap baat phone kijiye na ye.
Executive: Achha thik hai ek baar kaam karta hu mai aapko meeting ki link share kar raha hu thik hai aap meeting pe join karo fir mai like live phone pe kaise connect kar paunga hai na. Mai karta hu on meet hi karte hai ji ek minute rukiyega mai kar raha hu mai.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is upset with spam calls.

- Wants to know why IndiaMART number shows on Google.

- Questions why he is paying for spam calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained PNS and Truecaller functionality.

- Executive offered to connect via meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- spam calls, pns, google search, catalog
